param.name: guestStatus
param.label: Default Guest Comment Status
param.description: Determines default publication status of comments by unregistered users.

param.name: userStatus
param.label: Default User Comment Status
param.description: Determines default publication status for comments by registered users.

param.name: emailRequired
param.label: Email required
param.description: Selection controls if e-mail is required field for unregistered users. This will be ignored with registered users.

param.name: authorLink
param.label: Author Link based on
param.description: The Author Link is based on which field.

param.name: useCaptcha
param.label: Require CAPTCHA
param.description: Determines if unregistered users are required to use CAPTCHA (provided by SecurImage).

param.name: openComments
param.label: Default show comments
param.description: Always open the comments on page load.

param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date Format
param.description: Change the date format using the PHP date format.
